member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.DataProtectionExtensions
member.summary: Helpful extension methods for data protection APIs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.DataProtectionExtensions.CreateProtector(Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Creates an given a list of purposes.
member.param: The from which to generate the purpose chain.
The list of purposes which contribute to the purpose chain. This list must contain at least one element, and it may not contain null elements.
member.returns: An tied to the provided purpose chain.
member.remarks: This is a convenience method which chains together several calls to . See that method's documentation for more information.

member.summary: Creates an given a list of purposes.
member.param: The from which to generate the purpose chain.
The primary purpose used to create the .
An optional list of secondary purposes which contribute to the purpose chain. If this list is provided it cannot contain null elements.
member.returns: An tied to the provided purpose chain.
member.remarks: This is a convenience method which chains together several calls to . See that method's documentation for more information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.DataProtectionExtensions.GetApplicationUniqueIdentifier(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Returns a unique identifier for this application.
member.param: The application-level .
member.returns: A unique application identifier, or null if is null or cannot provide a unique application identifier.

remarks.para: The returned identifier should be stable for repeated runs of this same application on this machine. Additionally, the identifier is only unique within the scope of a single machine, e.g., two different applications on two different machines may return the same value.

This identifier may contain security-sensitive information such as physical file paths, configuration settings, or other machine-specific information. Callers should take special care not to disclose this information to untrusted entities.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.DataProtectionExtensions.Protect(Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.IDataProtector,System.String)
member.summary: Cryptographically protects a piece of plaintext data.

The plaintext data to protect.
member.returns: The protected form of the plaintext data.

The protected data to unprotect.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider
member.summary: An interface that can be used to create instances.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider.CreateProtector(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an given a purpose.
member.param: The purpose to be assigned to the newly-created .
member.returns: An IDataProtector tied to the provided purpose.
member.remarks: The parameter must be unique for the intended use case; two different instances created with two different values will not be able to decipher each other's payloads. The parameter value is not intended to be kept secret.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.IDataProtector
member.summary: An interface that can provide data protection services.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.IDataProtector.Protect(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Cryptographically protects a piece of plaintext data.
member.param: The plaintext data to protect.
member.returns: The protected form of the plaintext data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.IDataProtector.Unprotect(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Cryptographically unprotects a piece of protected data.
member.param: The protected data to unprotect.
member.returns: The plaintext form of the protected data.
member.exception: Thrown if the protected data is invalid or malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded string.
member.param: The base64url-encoded input to decode.
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws FormatException if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes an input using base64url encoding.
member.param: The binary input to encode.
member.returns: The base64url-encoded form of the input.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.Infrastructure.IApplicationDiscriminator
member.summary: Provides information used to discriminate applications.
member.remarks: This type supports the data protection system and is not intended to be used by consumers.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.DataProtection.Infrastructure.IApplicationDiscriminator.Discriminator
member.summary: An identifier that uniquely discriminates this application from all other applications on the machine.
